circumstances:
En route, the aircraft was shot down by the German Flak, dove into the ground and crashed in flames in a field. All four crew members were killed. 
Crew (320th Squadron):
F/O Gaston F. Mertens,
2nd Lt J. H. Muntinga,
Cpl P. H. Peetoom, 
Cpl P. J. E. van Dam.
probable_cause: Shot down by the German Flak.
